reviewText: Easy to watch and enjoyable. If you like Handy Manny's videos you will enjoy this one too. Always entertaining for the kids.
Thanks, everthing was in perfect conditon! My 5 year old loves it so much! hope to get some more movies from here

I have already written a review for this and do not know why it is here again, as I purchased only one copy.  A great Disney Jr movie for preschoolers.  Handy Manny and his tool friends and other friends are watching a movie.  But the projector breaks down.  Handy Manny and the tools have to fix it.  Some of the tools put on a show during the repair time.  They put on a fun show, full of laughter.  Finally everyone gets to see the movie, as the projector is fixed.
Good fun for the children. Handy Manny can be relied on to be safe watching for young children. Non violent and no bad language
grandson loves it
A great DVD for both kids and adults!!
Love it.  Thanks so much.

Handy Manny: Movie Night is a 2013 Disney DVD compilation of the classic Disney Junior animated series. Manny Garcia(Wilmer Valderrama, That 70's Show) and his team of magical talking tools, including Flicker, the newest member of the team, a flashlight who only speaks Spanish, helps out the good people of Sheetrock Hills that involves around entertainment. Whether it is fixing a projector at a movie theater, or repairing an old record player, Manny and the tools are on the job. This DVD also includes sneak peeks of other Disney favourites, like the Muppet Movie 35th Anniversary Edition, and a trailer for Super Buddies. Handy Manny: Movie Night is perfect for pre-schoolers who has a liking for movies and entertainment!
My son loves it!
this was a lifesaver on my recent trip from Tennessee to Kansas.

Great gift for grandson.
My 3 yr old loves Movie Night! This  is a great DVD addition to Handy Manny Fans. Highly recommend.
The humor from the tools is a bit more clever than Bob the Builder. They speak a little bit of Spanish kind-of like Dora.
You can't miss with Handy Manny. It is a fantastic show with great learning tools.
My son was so excited to receive this movie! It was in great condition and we had no problems playing it! I'm happy you can still find Handy Manny products new!

Brand new with wrapper attached. Great price & quick shipping!

My son loves Handy Manny.  He was really disappointed when it stopped showing on Netflix so I went online and bought him as many DVDs as I could find.  Some of the episodes have Flicker, while the others did not.  My son really likes Flicker so he watched this DVD the most.
Arrived on time and much loved by grandkids.
